short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension that changes all images and religious content to KALIL PALHANO!!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just a fun filter to religious content in internet.

*Everything is Kalil will provide you an kalilnist way to navigate in  the internet filtering words related to christianism like God or Jesus to Kalil Palhano and others words from Kalil mythology.

*Clicking in Everything is Kalil icon will replace all images in your current tab with images from our loved god Kalil Palhano.

______________________________________________________________________

*Report Bugs to kalilnistas@gmail.com or direct mensage us on instagram @Kalilnistas
